title: Is She Wrong For Calling Out Her Friend For Doing Something Unethical?
description:
Her friend's husband recently accepted a temporary job that's three hours away from where they live. Because of this, he moved into an apartment that's close the job.
Here's the problem: His wife doesn't trust him, so she installed cameras around his apartment to spy in him!
She thinks her friend is wrong for doing this, but their friend group sees nothing wrong. Who's right?
